g=@(x) (exp(x)-2)/(x.^2-4*x+2);
fpi(g,-0.5,50)

g=@(x) sqrt((x.^3+2*x+2-exp(x)))/2;
fpi(g,0.5,50)

r =

   0.641914634501946
